data: Timothy Benseman Assistant Professor Queens College (718) 997-3369 Timothy.Benseman@qc.cuny.edu Ph.D. University of Cambridge; MSc & BScHons in Physics, BA in Economics, Victoria University of Wellington; Development of high-temperature superconducting solid-state lasers and optoelectronic devices for operation in the 'terahertz gap' region.
